subtitleNullable: Twitter Data containing temporal, geographical, and general tweet metrics.
descriptionNullable:
### This is the data wrangled and cleaned from an existing dataset, and it is the output of my notebook: [https://www.kaggle.com/code/paakhim10/analyzing-and-classifying-twitter-sentiments](url)

####You can use this dataset for:

>• Machine Learning
1. Sentiment analysis
2. Spam detection
3. Text classification
4. Trend identification (temporal and geographical)
5. Building recommendation systems

>• Exploratory Data Analysis
1. Geospatial or temporal mapping
2. Hashtags Trend Detection
3. User Engagement Metrics

##### Credits:
If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
If you use this dataset in your research, please credit [https://data.world/kjensen18](url)
